content: 4 *kfb k29 32 35 kfb k1 repeat from * 68 74 80 sts round 6 *kfb k31 34 37 kfb k1 repeat from * 72 78 84 sts round 8 knit round 10 *kfb k33 36 39 kfb k1 repeat from * 76 82 88 sts round 12 knit round 14 k36 39 42 kfb k1 kfb k37 40 43 78 84 90 sts round 15 purl uppers switch to cc and proceed in rounds as follows notes a the first and last 14 16 18 sts of every round are worked in k1/p1 ribbing b the instruction to sssk in rnds 4 and 6 is not a typo the sssk slants left and mirrors the right-slanting k3tog see notes and abbreviations 11 round 1 knit round 2 rib 14 16 18 beginning with k1 k50 52 54 rib 14 16 18 beginning with k1 round 3 repeat round 2 round 4 rib 14 16 18 k13 14 14 ssk twice k3together k10 10 12 sssk k2tog twice k13 14 14 rib 14 16 18 72 76 82 sts round 5 rib 14 16 18 k 42 44 46 rib 14 16 18 round 6 rib 14 16 18 k9 10 10 ssk twice k3tog k10 10 12 sssk k2tog twice k9 10 10 rib 14 16 18 66 68 74 sts rib 14 16 18 slip these first 14 16 18 sts onto waste yarn beginning at the end of the round slip the last 14 16 18 sts onto the opposite end of the same waste yarn the 28 32 36 ribbed sts for the cuff are now on waste yarn reserved for later instep worked back and forth with short row row 1 k22 23 25 ssk turn row 2 sl1 p10 10 12 p2tog turn row 3 sl1 k10 10 12 ssk turn alternate row 2 and 3 until 12 12 14 sts remain in the instep 40 44 50 sts overall for the cuff cuff turn sl1 knit across 11 11 13 additional instep sts beginning at the center of the heel replace 14 16 18 sts from waste yarn representing the end of the round and rib in established pattern to the end of the round beginning at the instep replace the 14 16 18 sts from waste yarn that represent the beginning of the round round now be- gins and ends at the center back as before and includes instep sts 40 44 50 sts rnds 1-2 rib in k1/p1 ribbing around switch to mc rnds 3-4 repeat rnds 1-2 note for a higher cuff continue to alternate rounds 1 and 2 until the cuff is the desired height bobble in pattern finishing weave in ends and block if desired
